metadata.tagline: Manage your stress and experience greater calm and clarity
metadata.purpose: Visual dashboard of entire sales process from contact to close

branches.label: COLD APPROACH
branches.script_hint: Hi! I noticed... How's your day?

branches.label: WARM INTRO
branches.script_hint: Hey [Name]! I was thinking about you...

branches.label: EVENT/PARTY
branches.script_hint: Great event! What brings you here?

questions: How would you describe your energy levels?
What does feeling your best look like?
Where do you feel discomfort most?
Scale 1-10, how much does it impact you?
How does this affect your sleep/mood?
If this was solved, what would you do first?
What's most important - speed, drug-free, or ease?

3_presentation.title: PRESENT THE SOLUTION

steps.content: Many people struggle with stress challenges...
Think about what it costs you - missed moments, frustration...
That's why Peace uses Vibrotactile Technology...

3_presentation.differentiator: 100% Drug-Free • Non-Invasive • Works with your body

objections.response: I understand cost is important. What other criteria matter most to you beyond price?
Of course! What specific questions would help you decide?
Great idea! What concerns might they have we could address now?
I understand the skepticism. What would you need to see or experience to feel confident?
What did you like/dislike about those? What was missing?
That's fine. What specifically doesn't align with what you're looking for?
If you could reduce discomfort easily, how would that help your time and energy?
What appeals to you about [competitor]? (Then explain VTT difference)

5_closing.title: CLOSE THE SALE
5_closing.pre_close: Do you have any questions? Does this make sense?

techniques.name: ASSUMPTIVE
techniques.script: Would you like to start with a single pack or save with the bundle?

techniques.name: ALTERNATIVE
techniques.script: Would you prefer to pick it up today or have it shipped?

techniques.name: URGENCY
techniques.script: We have a special this week. Want to lock that in?

techniques.name: SUMMARY
techniques.script: So you want relief from X, without drugs, easily. [Product] does all that. Ready to try it?

techniques.name: REFERRAL
techniques.script: Who else do you know dealing with similar challenges?

6_follow_up.title: FOLLOW-UP SEQUENCE
6_follow_up.goal: Build relationship, get testimonials, generate referrals

visual_layout.sections_flow: Opening → Discovery → Present → Objections → Close → Follow-up
